name: Gloom Deluxe
overview: Gloom Deluxe is an First Person Shooter game, developed by Black Magic Software and published by Guildhall Leisure Services Ltd., which was released in 1996. It is essentially an upgrade to the previous Gloom. It includes the same levels, but with improved graphics and more options to optimize the graphic display. Another major change is the addition of a two-player coop mode for the single player campaign. In contrary to the original game, Gloom Deluxe also works on an upgraded Amiga 500.
